旅大.definition: Lüshun 旅順|旅顺[Lu:3 shun4] port and Dalian city 大連|大连[Da4 lian2], Liaoning Province 遼寧省|辽宁省[Liao2 ning2 Sheng3]

旅大市.definition: former name of Dalian city 大連|大连[Da4 lian2] incorporating Lüshun 旅順|旅顺[Lu:3 shun4]

旅大租地條約.pinyin: lǚ dà zū dì tiáo yuē
旅大租地條約.definition: unequal treaty of 1898 whereby the Qing dynasty ceded the lease of Lüshun (Port Arthur) to Russia

旅居.definition: to stay away from home; residence abroad; sojourn

旅平險.definition: travel insurance covering medical expenses (abbr. for 旅遊平安保險|旅游平安保险[lu:3you2 ping2an1 bao3xian3])

旅行.definition: to travel; journey; trip; CL:趟[tang4],次[ci4]

旅遊.definition: trip; journey; tourism; travel; tour; to travel

旅遊熱點.definition: a hot tourist attraction; a tourist trap

旅遊集散中心.pinyin: lǚ yóu jí sàn zhōng xīn
旅遊集散中心.definition: tour group assembly and dispatch center

旅順.definition: Lüshun; Lüshunkou district of Dalian city 大連市|大连市, Liaoning; called Port Arthur during Russian occupation and Russian-Japanese war of 1905

旅順口.definition: Lüshunkou district of Dalian city 大連市|大连市, Liaoning

旅順口區.definition: Lüshunkou district of Dalian city 大連市|大连市, Liaoning

旅順港.definition: Lüshun port, on the tip of the Liaoning peninsula; called Port Arthur during Russian occupation and Russian-Japanese war of 1905; in Lüshunkou district of Dalian 大連|大连, Liaoning
